CustomField.description: Takes saving into other investments at any frequency and returns monthly figure
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Other_Investments_Frequency__c ,"Weekly"), 52*Other_Investments__c/12, IF( ISPICKVAL(Other_Investments_Frequency__c ,"Monthly"), Other_Investments__c, IF( ISPICKVAL(Other_Investments_Frequency__c ,"Annually"), Other_Investments__c/12,0)))
CustomField.label: Others saving (monthly)
